title: Calories in Baklava
meta_description: Discover calories in baklava per piece, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard piece (~50 g) with layers of phyllo dough, walnuts, butter, and honey syrup; baked traditionally.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, nut type, syrup amount, portion size, and bakery; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One piece of baklava contains about 215 calories, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add extra layer of phyllo (more dough)

faqs.q: How many calories in one piece of baklava?
faqs.a: Approximately 215 kcal for a standard 50 g piece.
Yes, about 25 g carbs per piece, mainly from phyllo and syrup.
Butter, nuts, and sugar syrup contribute most to the 215 kcal.
Around 12 g total fat per piece, with 2.5 g saturated.
Yes, use less butter or syrup to reduce calories by 20-30 per piece.
